sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import IAccountProfile from '../server/src/models/accounts/AccountProfile' import { Paper, Grid, Table, TableBody, TableRow, TableCell } from '@material-ui/core' import {makeStyles, createStyles, Theme} from '@material-ui/core/styles' export default function ProfileView({ profile }: { profile: IAccountProfile }) { const classes = makeStyles((theme: Theme) => createStyles({ profileBox: { marginBottom: 25, padding: 10 }, boxTitle: { fontSize: '14pt', color: '#808080', paddingBottom: 5, borderBottom: '1px solid #DFDFDF' }, boxContent: {} }))() return (
Personal Information
Birth date {profile.birthDate ? new Date(profile.birthDate).toLocaleDateString() : '(missing)'} Birth place {profile.birthPlace} Residence {profile.residence} Phone number {profile.phoneNumber} Nationality {profile.nationality}
Identity
ID Card Number {profile.nicNumber || '(missing)'} Date of issue {profile.nicDateOfIssue ? new Date(profile.nicDateOfIssue).toLocaleDateString() : '(missing)'} Place of issue {profile.nicPlaceOfIssue || '(missing)'}
Academic Details
Highest academic qualification {profile.highestAcademicQualification || '(missing)'} Year of issue {profile.yearOfIssue || '(missing)'} English grade in GCEOL {profile.englishGradeInGCEOL || '(missing)'} Mathematics grade in GCEOL {profile.mathematicsGradeInGCEOL || '(missing)'}
Professional Details
Professional qualification {profile.professionalQualification || '(missing)'} Employment status {profile.employmentStatus || '(missing)'} Job title {profile.jobTitle || '(missing)'} Years of experiene {profile.yearsOfExperience || '(missing)'} Employer name {profile.employerName || '(missing)'} Employer address {profile.employerAddress || '(missing)'}
Other details
) }
